trans-unit.source: Operation Counters

seg-source.mrk: Operation Counters

trans-unit.source: Items with machine-like attributes may have a counter to log which work is done in what time. cc|rental offers two types of counters to meet this requirement:

seg-source.mrk: Items with machine-like attributes may have a counter to log which work is done in what time.
cc|rental offers two types of counters to meet this requirement:

trans-unit.source: A counter for operation hours

seg-source.mrk: A counter for operation hours

trans-unit.source: A counter for operation miles

seg-source.mrk: A counter for operation miles

trans-unit.source: On a Machine Type Card, the type of counter can be assigned by clicking Navigate > Technical Data.

seg-source.mrk: On a Machine Type Card, the type of counter can be assigned by clicking Navigate > Technical Data.

trans-unit.source: : Machine Type Card page, highlighting the Technical Data icon in the Item menu group

seg-source.mrk: : Machine Type Card page, highlighting the Technical Data icon in the Item menu group

trans-unit.source: On the Technical Data Card page, general attributes for all Machines of that type can be set up.

seg-source.mrk: On the Technical Data Card page, general attributes for all Machines of that type can be set up.

trans-unit.source: : Technical Data Card page

seg-source.mrk: : Technical Data Card page

trans-unit.source: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

seg-source.mrk: The fields on the General FastTab are described in the following table.

trans-unit.source: Field

seg-source.mrk: Field

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: Description

trans-unit.source: Type of Counter

seg-source.mrk: Type of Counter

trans-unit.source: Enables the use of operation counters. The options are Hours, Miles, or Hours+Miles.

seg-source.mrk: Enables the use of operation counters.
The options are Hours, Miles, or Hours+Miles.

trans-unit.source: Performance (kW)

seg-source.mrk: Performance (kW)

trans-unit.source: General value for the performance of the machines of the type in kilowatts (kW). The value in the Performance (HP) field is automatically updated if a value is entered here.

seg-source.mrk: General value for the performance of the machines of the type in kilowatts (kW).
The value in the Performance (HP) field is automatically updated if a value is entered here.

trans-unit.source: Performance (HP)

seg-source.mrk: Performance (HP)

trans-unit.source: General value for the performance of the machines of the type in horsepower (HP). The value in the Performance (KW) field is automatically updated if a value is entered here.

seg-source.mrk: General value for the performance of the machines of the type in horsepower (HP).
The value in the Performance (KW) field is automatically updated if a value is entered here.

trans-unit.source: Internet Link

seg-source.mrk: Internet Link

trans-unit.source: Web site of the vendor or manufacturer.

seg-source.mrk: Web site of the vendor or manufacturer.

trans-unit.source: Description

seg-source.mrk: External color of the Machine Type.

trans-unit.source: Internal Colour

seg-source.mrk: Internal Colour

trans-unit.source: Internal color of the Machine Type.

seg-source.mrk: Internal color of the Machine Type.

trans-unit.source: The values that are entered in the Technical Data Card page are transferred to the Machine Card on creation (purchase or positive adjustment).

seg-source.mrk: The values that are entered in the Technical Data Card page are transferred to the Machine Card on creation (purchase or positive adjustment).

trans-unit.source: Exercise – Set up an Operation Counter

seg-source.mrk: Exercise – Set up an Operation Counter

trans-unit.source: The MIG Welder is now equipped with a counter for Operation Hours. To log the hour counter reading, the counter must be activated. A purchase order for two new excavators with this type is created and then the counter is updated on the Service Order.

seg-source.mrk: The MIG Welder is now equipped with a counter for Operation Hours.
To log the hour counter reading, the counter must be activated.
A purchase order for two new excavators with this type is created and then the counter is updated on the Service Order.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: The “Create a Machine Type” exercise must be completed prior to performing this exercise.

seg-source.mrk: The “Create a Machine Type” exercise must be completed prior to performing this exercise.

trans-unit.source: Activate the Counter for Operation Hours

seg-source.mrk: Activate the Counter for Operation Hours

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to activate the counter for Operation Hours:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to activate the counter for Operation Hours:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Machines > Types > Machine Types.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Machines > Types > Machine Types.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the line for number R-50000-01.

seg-source.mrk: Double-click the line for number R-50000-01.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Technical Data.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Navigate > Technical Data.

trans-unit.source: In the Type of Counter field, enter Hours.

seg-source.mrk: In the Type of Counter field, enter Hours.

trans-unit.source: In the External Colour field, enter BLUE.

seg-source.mrk: In the External Colour field, enter BLUE.

trans-unit.source: : Technical Data Card page for item R-50000-01

seg-source.mrk: : Technical Data Card page for item R-50000-01

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the open pages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the open pages.

trans-unit.source: Buy Machines with Technical Data

seg-source.mrk: Buy Machines with Technical Data

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to buy machines that generally are used with technical data (counters):

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to buy machines that generally are used with technical data (counters):

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Purchasing > Order Processing > Purchase Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Purchasing > Order Processing > Purchase Orders.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New.

trans-unit.source: In the Buy-from Vendor No. field, enter R-50000.

seg-source.mrk: In the Buy-from Vendor No.
field, enter R-50000.

trans-unit.source: In the Lines FastTab, enter Item in the Type field.

seg-source.mrk: In the Lines FastTab, enter Item in the Type field.

trans-unit.source: In the No. field, enter R-50000-01.

seg-source.mrk: In the No.
field, enter R-50000-01.

trans-unit.source: In the Location Code field, enter BLUE.

seg-source.mrk: In the Location Code field, enter BLUE.

trans-unit.source: In the Quantity field, enter 2.

seg-source.mrk: In the Quantity field, enter 2.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Item Tracking Lines.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Actions > Create Customized SN.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Actions > Create Customized SN.

trans-unit.source: In the Customized SN field, type R-50000-01-00006.

seg-source.mrk: In the Customized SN field, type R-50000-01-00006.

trans-unit.source: Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Item Tracking Lines page.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Post.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Post.

trans-unit.source: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the Receive option and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Purchase Order.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Purchase Order.

trans-unit.source: Review the Machine Type Item Information

seg-source.mrk: Review the Machine Type Item Information

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to review the updates to the Machine:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to review the updates to the Machine:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, under Machines, click Machines > Machines.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, under Machines, click Machines > Machines.

trans-unit.source: Go to the end of the list.

seg-source.mrk: Go to the end of the list.

trans-unit.source: Double-click the line for the MIG Welder with serial number R-50000-01-00006.

seg-source.mrk: Double-click the line for the MIG Welder with serial number R-50000-01-00006.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Technical Data FastTab and notice that the fields that were populated on the Technical Data Card page for the machine are populated in the Machine Card.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Technical Data FastTab and notice that the fields that were populated on the Technical Data Card page for the machine are populated in the Machine Card.

trans-unit.source: : Machine Card with information from the Technical Data Card page

seg-source.mrk: : Machine Card with information from the Technical Data Card page

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the Machine Card.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the Machine Card.

trans-unit.source: Update the Counter Value

seg-source.mrk: Update the Counter Value

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to update the counter of a Machine:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to update the counter of a Machine:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Service > Order Processing > Service Orders.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Service > Order Processing > Service Orders.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER to automatically populate the No. field.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click New and then press ENTER to automatically populate the No.
field.

trans-unit.source: In the Customer No. field, enter R-99999.

seg-source.mrk: In the Customer No.
field, enter R-99999.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click the arrow in the Service Item No. field.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click the arrow in the Service Item No.
field.

trans-unit.source: Select the line for Item No. = R-50000-01 and Serial No. = R-50000-01-00006 and then click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Select the line for Item No.
= R-50000-01 and Serial No.
= R-50000-01-00006 and then click OK.

trans-unit.source: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Service Item Worksheet.

seg-source.mrk: On the Lines FastTab, click Line > Service Item Worksheet.

trans-unit.source: On the ribbon, click Actions > Update Counter.

seg-source.mrk: On the ribbon, click Actions > Update Counter.

trans-unit.source: In the Operation Hours field, enter 23.

seg-source.mrk: In the Operation Hours field, enter 23.

trans-unit.source: : Counter Input page

seg-source.mrk: : Counter Input page

trans-unit.source: Click OK.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK.

trans-unit.source: Click OK to close the open pages.

seg-source.mrk: Click OK to close the open pages.

trans-unit.source: Note

seg-source.mrk: Note

trans-unit.source: The “Update Counter” function is also accessible on the Stock Movement pages (refer to topic “Stock Movements” on page 1).

seg-source.mrk: The “Update Counter” function is also accessible on the Stock Movement pages (refer to topic “Stock Movements” on page 1).

trans-unit.source: Review the Updated Counter Information

seg-source.mrk: Review the Updated Counter Information

trans-unit.source: Updated counter information is viewable on the related fields on the Machine Card.

seg-source.mrk: Updated counter information is viewable on the related fields on the Machine Card.

trans-unit.source: Follow these steps to update the counter of a Machine:

seg-source.mrk: Follow these steps to update the counter of a Machine:

trans-unit.source: In the navigation pane, click Machines > Machines > Machines.

seg-source.mrk: In the navigation pane, click Machines > Machines > Machines.

trans-unit.source: Open the Machine Card for item R-50000-01, Serial Number R-50000-01-00006.

seg-source.mrk: Open the Machine Card for item R-50000-01, Serial Number R-50000-01-00006.

trans-unit.source: Expand the Technical Data FastTab and notice that the Operation Hours is set to 23.

seg-source.mrk: Expand the Technical Data FastTab and notice that the Operation Hours is set to 23.

trans-unit.source: : Machine Card with updated counter information from service order

seg-source.mrk: : Machine Card with updated counter information from service order

trans-unit.source: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2017-10-05T19:22:12.2196272-05:00" MadCap:creator="NDOKS" MadCap:initials="ND" MadCap:comment="New 2017 SP1" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-08-24T10:45:00.0180589-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Counter</MadCap:annotation> Registration Worksheet

seg-source.mrk: <MadCap:annotation MadCap:createDate="2017-10-05T19:22:12.2196272-05:00" MadCap:creator="NDOKS" MadCap:initials="ND" MadCap:comment="New 2017 SP1" MadCap:editor="NTadajewski0100" MadCap:editDate="2018-08-24T10:45:00.0180589-05:00" xmlns:MadCap="http://www.madcapsoftware.com/Schemas/MadCap.xsd">Counter</MadCap:annotation> Registration Worksheet

trans-unit.source: The Counter Registration Worksheet – accessed on the Machines menu by clicking Tasks or Machines – gathers all values for existing machines for a mass update. Operation Hours and Miles can be entered for multiple machines and posted at once with the “Register Changes” function.

seg-source.mrk: The Counter Registration Worksheet – accessed on the Machines menu by clicking Tasks or Machines – gathers all values for existing machines for a mass update.
Operation Hours and Miles can be entered for multiple machines and posted at once with the “Register Changes” function.

trans-unit.source: : Counter Registration Worksheet

seg-source.mrk: : Counter Registration Worksheet

trans-unit.source: Each entry must be entered with a Registration Date and Time. When the hours or miles are entered, the Modified check box is selected.

seg-source.mrk: Each entry must be entered with a Registration Date and Time.
When the hours or miles are entered, the Modified check box is selected.

trans-unit.source: : Counter History for item R-10000-02 and new counter entry in worksheet

seg-source.mrk: : Counter History for item R-10000-02 and new counter entry in worksheet

trans-unit.source: Only when the date and time combination is greater than the latest value in the Counter History will the value be updated on the Machine Card.

seg-source.mrk: Only when the date and time combination is greater than the latest value in the Counter History will the value be updated on the Machine Card.

trans-unit.source: : Operations updated on Machine Card

seg-source.mrk: : Operations updated on Machine Card

trans-unit.source: If changes are not registered, a warning message appears when the Counter Registration Worksheet is closed.

seg-source.mrk: If changes are not registered, a warning message appears when the Counter Registration Worksheet is closed.

trans-unit.source: : Message upon closing Counter Registration Worksheet with modified, unregistered entries

seg-source.mrk: : Message upon closing Counter Registration Worksheet with modified, unregistered entries
